author: Álvaro Soto
title: Alerta roja en Huelva con 117 litros caídos en Cartaya en tres horas
text:
Secciones
Servicios
Destacamos
Necesitas ser registrado para acceder a esta funcionalidad.
Opciones para compartir
Huelva ha amanecido este viernes en situación de alerta roja. La Agencia Estatal de Meteorología (Aemet) preveía para esta provincia una preecipitación acumulada en 12 horas de 140 litros por metro cuadrado y estimaba que iban a continuar con gran intensidad las lluvias en esta zona durante las siguientes horas, aunque ya el aviso pasaba a naranja.
En Huelva, Aemet ha registrado lluvias torrenciales en localidades como Cartaya, con 117 litros por metro cuadrado en menos de tres horas, 70 de ellos en solo una hora. El aviso ha estado activo por lo menos hasta las 9:00 de la mañana.
En total, siete provincias están hoy, día de Todos los Santos, bajo algún tipo de alerta, cuatro de ellas, en aviso naranja: por lluvia en Huelva y Tarragona y Mallorca y Menorca por lluvias y tormentas. Además, habrá avisos amarillos por lluvia en Alicante y Valencia (Comunidad Valenciana). Por otro lado, se registrarán avisos amarillos por lluvias y tormentas en Ibiza y Formentera (Baleares) y Badajoz (Extremadura).
Noticias relacionadas
La península y Baleares continuarán hoy bajo la influencia de bajas presiones, con precipitaciones que afectarán al cuadrante sudoeste, el sudoeste de Castilla y León, Aragón, Cataluña, Levante y Baleares. En concreto, la Agencia Estatal de Meteorología (Aemet) prevé chubascos y tormentas localmente fuertes y persistentes en el extremo occidental de Andalucía, en el bajo Ebro y en Baleares, y tampoco se descartan en el sur del sistema Central occidental.
La tendencia se mantendrá mañana, una jornada para la que la Aemet pronostica chubascos y tormentas localmente fuertes o persistentes en el sur de Cataluña, Baleares y los litorales de Castellón y Valencia, aunque también podría haber precipitaciones en sus interiores.
Para el domingo, la agencia plantea un escenario de mayor estabilidad, pero todavía serán probables precipitaciones en el Levante, en el medio y el bajo Ebro y en los litorales catalanes, el Estrecho y Baleares, con una posibilidad de chubascos y tormentas localmente fuertes y persistentes en el entorno del bajo Ebro.

author: none@none.com (Sohail Sarfraz)
title: FD Outlook misreports FBR collection data
text: ISLAMABAD: December Monthly Economic Update and Outlook, Finance Division publication, misreported the Federal Board of Revenue (FBR) collection data, sources in the FBR informed this correspondent. The 29.6 percent growth in July-October 2023-24 tax collection against the same period of 2022-23 is actually for five months (July-November), instead of the four months noted in the Update. The rise, sources added, was due entirely to inflation (average 28.6 percent July-November 2023 against 25.1 percent) in the same period last year, advance in tax quarterly payments (usual rise in the first two quarters of a fiscal year), rise in withholding tax rates in the Finance Bill 2024 and raising the standard sales tax rate by one percent – from 17 to 18 percent in the Supplementary Finance Bill 2023. The update revealed FBR tax collection surpassed the target by Rs 27 billion during July-November 2023-24 and at this pace it is expected that tax collection target for the first half of the current year will be achieved. [‘Simultaneous’ probe of same taxpayer: IHC seeks explanation from FBR](https://www.brecorder.com/news/40280871) In the current month (December) sources in the FBR were confident that collections would amount to 940 billion as (i) corporate returns with tax payments will be filed by 31 December, 2023 and (ii) full payment of advance tax would be due by banks in December 2023. Meeting the revenue target for the last half of the current fiscal year will pose problems as in past years, a view substantiated by tax experts adding that it would not be possible for the FBR to achieve the budgeted target of Rs 9.4 trillion by the end of the fiscal year on 30th June 2024. The shortfall in revenue collection is expected in the third quarter (January-March) and fourth quarter of 2023-24. FBR provisionally collected Rs 3,484 billion during July-November (2023-24) against Rs 2,688 billion in same period of 2022-23, reflecting a growth of 29.6 percent. The continuation of taxation measures taken in February 2023 of Rs 170 billion would have a revenue impact of Rs680 billion in 2023-24. The FBR has taken tax measures of Rs 223 billion in budget (2023-24). The additional measures of Rs 215 billion were taken through amended Finance Bill 2023. Therefore, the total revenue impact of all measures including mini-budget would be over Rs 1,115 billion in 2023-24. FBR’s collection from withholding taxes (under sales tax mode) contributed over 70 percent to total direct tax collections during July-December (2023-24). author: Richard Tribou - Orlando Sentinel (TNS)
title: Hurricane center says high chance tropical depression will form in Caribbean | Wire | dailyitem.com
text: ORLANDO, Fla. — With one month left in hurricane season, the National Hurricane Center said Friday said there was a high chance a Caribbean system will form into the season’s next tropical depression while tracking two more systems with potential to develop. As of the NHC’s 2 p.m. Eastern time tropical outlook, it said a broad area of low pressure is likely to develop over the southwestern Caribbean Sea in the next day. “Gradual development is possible thereafter, and a tropical depression is likely to form late this weekend or early next week while the system drifts generally northward or northwestward over the central or western Caribbean Sea,” forecasters said. Heavy rain is possible either way over the next several days across portions of the adjacent land areas in the western Caribbean. The NHC gives it a 30% chance to develop in the next two days and 70% in the next seven days. If it were to gain enough steam, it could become Tropical Storm Patty. The NHC also began tracking Thursday two more systems. One is a trough of low pressure near Puerto Rico producing widespread cloudiness and showers over the Dominican Republic, Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, the northern Leeward Islands and adjacent waters of the Atlantic and the northeastern Caribbean. “Slow development of this system is possible during the next 2-3 days as it moves west-northwestward near the Greater Antilles,” forecasters said. “After that time, this system is expected to be absorbed into the low pressure area over the Caribbean.” It’s expected to bring local heavy rains over the next several days from the northern Leeward Islands westward across Puerto Rico and Hispaniola to eastern Cuba and the southeastern Bahamas. The NHC gives it a 10% chance to develop in the next two to seven days. Then, in the North Atlantic, a low pressure system with increased convection Fridya was located a few hundred miles west of the western Azores. “Earlier satellite derived wind data depicted winds to storm-force mainly to the south of the the center,” forecasters said. “Environmental conditions appear favorable for some additional development and the system could become a subtropical or tropical storm as it moves generally eastward during the next few days.” The NHC gives it a 40% chance to develop in the next two to seven days. The potential systems would come in the final month of the official hurricane season, which runs from June 1-Nov. 30. The 2024 Atlantic hurricane season has so far seen 15 named storms, 10 of which have become hurricanes. Three of those struck Florida. --

author: Dylan Bailey
title: Supernus Pharmaceuticals Reports Positive Phase 2a Study Results
text: Supernus Pharmaceuticals Reports Positive Phase 2a Study Results [Dylan Bailey](https://investorshangout.com/profile/view?id=78709)Updated: 10-17-2024 05:12 PM Promising Results from Supernus Pharmaceuticals Supernus Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ: SUPN), a biopharmaceutical firm dedicated to addressing central nervous system (CNS) disorders, has recently unveiled remarkable data from its exploratory open-label Phase 2a clinical study concerning SPN-820 and its effects on adults experiencing major depressive disorder (MDD). This landmark study indicates rapid improvement in depressive symptoms, providing hope for those suffering from this challenging mental health condition. Overview of the Phase 2a Study The Phase 2a clinical trial involved a total of 40 participants, with 38 completing the treatment over a 10-day period. The main goal was to assess the safety and effectiveness of SPN-820, which was administered in a dosage of 2400 mg every three days in combination with existing antidepressant treatments. The findings have illustrated significant changes in patients' mental health within a short timeframe. Key Findings of the Study Results that emerged from the analysis were both encouraging and statistically significant: - Within two hours, patients experienced a clinically relevant improvement of -6.1 on the Hamilton Depression Rating Scale-6 (HAM-D6) and -9.6 by Day 10. - On the Montgomery Åsberg Depression Rating Scale (MADRS), scores improved by -16.6 at four hours, reaching -22.9 by Day 10. - Remarkably, suicidal ideation saw an 80% decrease, dropping from 12.5% among participants at the outset to just 2.6% by the end of the study. - What’s more, SPN-820 demonstrated a high level of tolerability among participants, with very few adverse effects reported, leading to only a 2.5% discontinuation rate. - Common side effects included headaches, feelings of nausea, drowsiness, and dizziness, while other minor effects were also noted. Insights from Leadership Jack Khattar, President and CEO of Supernus, expressed optimism about SPN-820's potential. He noted, "These Phase 2a data reinforce our belief that SPN-820 may emerge as a new viable treatment option for depression, showing rapid effectiveness without the typical adverse effects. Our goal is to complete patient enrollment for the Phase 2b randomized double-blind placebo-controlled study soon.” Future Webcast Discussion Additionally, Supernus will hold a conference call and live webcast to discuss these findings in detail. Stakeholders and the general public can find this important information on the Company’s Investor Relations platform. About SPN-820 SPN-820 is an innovative oral therapeutic designed to augment mTORC1 activity within the brain, aiming to enhance synaptic functioning. This new treatment avenue is particularly promising due to its ability to induce rapid-onset antidepressant responses, setting it apart from traditional treatments that may take longer to show effectiveness. About Supernus Pharmaceuticals Supernus Pharmaceuticals continues to evolve its extensive portfolio, which already includes several approved medications treating conditions such as epilepsy, migraine, and ADHD. The ongoing research aims to expand their offerings into other CNS disorders, reinforcing their commitment to improving mental health and quality of life for patients. Frequently Asked Questions What is SPN-820? SPN-820 is a first-in-class small molecule developed by Supernus Pharmaceuticals aimed at rapidly alleviating symptoms of major depressive disorder. What were the main findings of the Phase 2a study? The Phase 2a study showed significant reductions in depressive symptoms and suicidal ideation among participants, indicating it was well-tolerated with few side effects. Who conducted the Phase 2a study? The study was conducted by Supernus Pharmaceuticals, which specializes in developing treatments for central nervous system diseases. When can we expect more results from Supernus? Further results from the ongoing Phase 2b study of SPN-820 are anticipated in the first half of the upcoming year. How can interested parties learn more? For more information, interested individuals can access Supernus Pharmaceuticals' Investor Relations website or participate in the scheduled webcast. author: 网易
title: 吴易昺谈晋级16强：自己越打越好了，不是很担心排名方面的事情|网球_网易订阅
text:
直播吧7月24日讯 在凌晨结束的ATP500华盛顿站第二轮中，吴易昺苦战三盘击败10号种子波佩林晋级16强。赛后，吴易昺接受了记者采访。
谈今天自己的发挥
吴易昺：我以前跟他打过很多次，在底线上自己有一些优势。他在发球上做的比我好一些，我在一发方面需要提高，自己总体来说做的还不错。
对自己现阶段状态感觉如何
吴易昺：这站比赛我觉得越打越好，在底线找到了自己击球的感觉，然后也可以把一些技术都连接在一起。在中前场还有一些进步的空间，特别是我的拦网，底线的正反拍都打出了侵略性，希望可以继续保持。
如何看待目前排名以及展望下一轮比赛
吴易昺：对于网球选手来说排名大家一定都会在意，但是我伤病之后的排名意义不是特别大，希望自己可以多多健康参加比赛。排名的话，是一个自然会发生的事情，我并不是特别担心排名方面的事情。下一轮对阵梅德韦杰夫，他会很难缠，希望自己可以打出有侵略性的网球，希望自己可以发挥的更好。

author: Nastya Bobkova
title: Xiaomi presents the new Redmi Book Pro 14 2025: power and innovation
text:
Xiaomi has announced a new laptop model, the Redmi Book Pro 14 2025, which has received a number of improvements over previous versions.
Here's What We Know The novelty is equipped with a 14-inch display with a resolution of 2.8K (2880×1800 pixels) and a refresh rate of 120 Hz, which provides high image clarity and smooth scrolling. The display has a brightness of up to 500 nits, which makes it easy to work even outdoors.
Inside, there are new Intel Arrow Lake processors. Users can choose between two options: Core Ultra 5 225H, combined with Arc 130T graphics, or the more powerful Core Ultra 7 255H with Arc 140T graphics. Both chips support the latest technologies and offer high performance for a variety of tasks, from office work to multimedia content and even light gaming.
The Redmi Book Pro 14 2025 offers up to 32GB of LPDDR5X RAM operating at 8400 MT/s. Up to 1TB of PCIe 4.0 SSD storage, which provides fast access to data and smooth work with large files.
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->products and services
Economy, Business and Finance->computing and information technology

author: ABC.es
title: Alerta por inundaciones en Cataluña: fuertes tormentas a partir de este día según la previsión de Meteocat
text: Protección Civil ha activado la alerta del plan Inuncat debido a la previsión de fuertes lluvias y tormentas en Cataluña. El Servicio Meteorológico de Cataluña (Meteocat) ha informado que, después de una semana de temperaturas récord, la situación atmosférica cambiará drásticamente en las próximas horas y se espera una jornada de lluvias generalizadas en toda la región, que podrían venir acompañadas de temporales , tormentas eléctricas , fuertes vientos e incluso granizo . Por ello, se han emitido alertas amarillas y naranjas en casi todas las comarcas catalanas por el riesgo de inundaciones .Según el Meteocat, las previsiones indican que las precipitaciones podrían superar los 20 litros por metro cuadrado en solo 30 minutos en varias zonas de la comunidad, especialmente en las comarcas del Pirineo , Prepirineo , Cataluña Central y Terra Alta . Asimismo, en áreas como el Bages , Berguedà , Lluçanès y Ripollès , las lluvias podrían alcanzar los 40 litros por metro cuadrado en el mismo periodo de tiempo.¿Dónde lloverá en Cataluña?Las precipitaciones comenzarán por la mañana en forma de chubascos en el Pirineo , Prepirineo y Puertos de Morella . Mientras que, por la tarde, las precipitaciones se extenderán por la zona central de Cataluña, el prelitoral central y norte , y las comarcas de Lérida . Asimismo, hacia el final del día, las lluvias alcanzarán otras zonas del litoral y Tarragona . «Los chubascos serán de intensidad entre débil y moderada, aunque localmente podrán ser fuertes y acompañados de tormenta y granizo», manifiestan.Noticia Relacionada estandar No Jorge Rey lanza un aviso: este «fenómeno inusual» podría llegar a España según las cabañuelas Marina OrtizPor su parte, en Barcelona , se espera que las lluvias comiencen a última hora de la tarde . Durante el día, el cielo estará despejado, pero se nublará a partir de las siete de la tarde y las lluvias podrían comenzar a las nueve , dejando hasta 1,1 litros por metro cuadrado en una hora . También se prevén posibles tormentas eléctricas y rachas de viento moderadas. Las temperaturas oscilarán entre los 27 y 30 grados durante toda la jornada y se mantendrán altas incluso durante la noche entre el viernes y el sábado.Las recomendaciones por la alerta de fuertes lluviasEn el comunicado, las autoridades han insistido en la importancia de evitar desplazamientos innecesarios y de no aparcar en zonas propensas a inundarse . Asimismo, han recomendado no cruzar ríos o rieras si llevan agua y circular preferentemente por las rutas principales y autopistas , moderando la velocidad y manteniendo la distancia de seguridad con otros vehículos.Además, si las lluvias nos sorprenden en la montaña , las autoridades aconsejan dirigirse a puntos elevados alejados de márgenes de ríos y cauces de barrancos . En caso de encontrarse en casa , se recomienda no bajar a zonas inundables como sótanos o garajes, asegurar objetos y muebles que puedan ser arrastrados por el agua. Y, por último, colocar en lugares altos los animales domésticos , alimentos , documentos importantes y productos peligrosos como disolventes o veneno para ratas.

author: 责编：秦璐敏
title: 36岁"小将"张帅淘汰45岁大威，晋级华盛顿赛女双4强，大威遭遇复出后首败
text:
4NcaBATJdhY sports.huanqiu.com article 36岁“小将”张帅淘汰45岁大威，晋级华盛顿赛女双4强，大威遭遇复出后首败 /e3pmh3jvm/e3pn61psg 7月24日，WTA500华盛顿站双打1/4决赛，2号种子张帅/汤森德以6-4、3-6、10-6击败巴普蒂斯特/大威廉姆斯，成功闯入四强。
在WTA500华盛顿站，45岁的美国名将大威廉姆斯时隔16个月重返赛场。此前她双线作战，分别取得女子单打和双打的胜利。
本场比赛是36岁“小将”张帅迎战45岁“老将”大威廉姆斯，争夺女双四强席位。也是大威廉姆斯宣布复出后的第3场比赛。
在长时间远离赛场后，大威廉姆斯一度被外界认为已经退役。大威廉姆斯曾谈到了自己重回赛场的决定，她说：“大多数时候我不会接受持外卡出战的邀请。但这次我一直在练球，依旧非常热爱这项运动，硬地也是我最喜欢的场地，所以是不同因素促成了这个决定。”
当被问及自己是否还能赢得比赛时，大威廉姆斯回答说：“我已经一年没有打球了，但毫无疑问我还能打，我感觉我会打得很好，我还是那个我，我是个重炮手，我的球很重，这是我的招牌。”
此外，大威廉姆斯还谈到了自己的妹妹小威廉姆斯。再被问及小威廉姆斯是否会复出时，大威廉姆斯说：“如果她还在，情况就会好转，我们以前总是一起打比赛，我当然也很想念她。如果她选择回归，我相信她会让你们所有人都知道的。”
1994年，14岁的大威初登职业赛场。2025年，45岁的她依旧在书写传奇。
上一场单打获胜后，大威廉姆斯成为自2004年温网纳芙拉蒂洛娃（47岁）以来，在WTA巡回赛级别正赛获胜的最年长的球员。
赛后，大威廉姆斯接受采访时表示：“为了医疗保险我必须回来打啊！今年他们告知我被纳入了COBRA（失业后延续医疗保险），我得确保自己享有这些权益，就开始训练了。你们也知道医保的，我总是要去看医生，所以我真的很需要这个保险。”
此外，WTA500华盛顿站双打首轮，徐一璠/杨钊煊以6-4、6-4淘汰乔恩特/佩雷兹，成功晋级八强。
来源：九派新闻综合

author: Nhung Nguyen – Translated by Thanh Nha
title: Foreign investors return, stock market rebounds | SGGP English Edition
text: The stock market in the trading session on December 28 displayed positive trends, propelled by the upward momentum from large-cap stock groups. In particular, the real estate and construction sector exhibited some divergences. The Vingroup trio made positive contributions to the index, with VHM rising by 4.3 percent, VRE adding up by 1.08 percent, and VIC surging by 1.95 percent. In addition, DXG, PDR, DIG, VCG, and CII all saw an increase of nearly 1 percent. On the contrary, CTD decreased by 1.58 percent, SZC slid by 1.23 percent, ITA plunged by 4.18 percent, and HQC declined by 1.92 percent, while NLG, NVL, CEO, HDG, HHV, HDC, and BCG experienced a decrease of almost 1 percent. The financial and banking stock group grew positively, with several major banking stocks posting strong gains. Specifically, SSB soared by 4.42 percent, TCB edged up by 1.21 percent, VPB strengthened by 1.62 percent, ACB enhanced by 1.93 percent, and VIB rallied by 2.34 percent. Additionally, HDB, CTG, VCB, KLB, EIB, MBB, and SHB saw an increase of nearly 1 percent. The securities group also leaned toward the green zone, with HCM gaining by 1.8 percent, VCI winning by 1.55 percent, and APG enlarging by 1.66 percent, while FTS, SSI, VND, CTS, and BSI advanced by almost 1 percent. Moreover, among the manufacturing stock group, ASM climbed by 1.96 percent, VGC grew by 1.68 percent, VNM augmented by 1.48 percent, HSG inched up by 1.1 percent, and PAN moved up by 1.51 percent. At the close of the trading session, the VN-Index increased by 6.94 points, or 0.62 percent, to reach 1,128.93 points, with 312 stocks gaining, 219 losing, and 111 remaining unchanged. On the Hanoi Stock Exchange (HNX), the HNX-Index also rose by 0.75 points, or 0.33 percent, to close at 231.35 points, with 94 winners, 64 losers, and 78 unchanged stocks. Liquidity on the HOSE decreased by about VND4 trillion compared to the previous session, with a total trading value of approximately VND15.5 trillion. Foreign investors returned with a net buying value of VND443 billion on the HOSE, marking the second consecutive session of net buying after a streak of 20 selling sessions.
